headline: Apple 'way behind' on AI. But maybe that's not a bad thing right now.
summary: As Apple (AAPL) advertises its latest generation of devices — namely the iPhone 17 and slim iPhone Air — around its artificial intelligence features, does this position it as a growth stock? Ritholtz Wealth Management chief market strategist Callie Cox weighs in on Apple's status as a growth stock option and whether the company is falling behind on its AI promises. Also catch Yahoo Finance's full interview with AT&T (T) CEO John Stankey, where he comments on the release of the iPhone 17. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.
